summary: THE TRAILER BRAKE SYSTEM DEACTIVATED RECENTLY AND ON INSPECTION, FROM THE FACTORY, THE CRITICAL BRAKE SYSTEM WAS LOOSELY ZIP-TIED BETWEEN THE FIRST AXLE AND THE FRAME IN A PINCH-ZONE AND THIS RESULTED IN SEVERING OF THE TWO WIRES RESULTING IN A NO-BRAKE CONDITION.  WAS NOT AWARE THAT WE HAD NO BRAKES WHILE TOWING A RACE CAR AND SKIDDED ON THE HIGHWAY, BUT DID NOT RESULT IN AN ACCIDENT. HAD TO REPAIR THE TWO WIRES. THIS IS A HUGE AND CRITICAL SAFETY ISSUE THAT MAY IMPACT OTHER TRAILERS MADE BY LOOK INDUSTRIES. ## VIN PASSED ## LGS INDUSTRIES 2019 ##
